DDL:
CREATE TABLE veg_cat (
    index INTEGER,
    item_code INTEGER,
    item_name TEXT,
    category_code INTEGER,
    category_name TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE veg_txn_df (
    index INTEGER,
    txn_date TIMESTAMP,
    txn_time TEXT,
    item_code INTEGER,
    qty_sold(kg) REAL,
    unit_selling_px_rmb/kg REAL,
    sale/return TEXT,
    discount(%) INTEGER,
    day_of_week TEXT
);
